### Tender Opportunities
#### Autopsy Services for Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01020068  
**Solicitation Number:** 1000247958  
**Publication Date:** 2023-01-04  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-28 14:00:00  
**Status:** Expired

**Contracting Authority:** Health Canada

**End-User:** Health Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Address: 200 Eglantine Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K9, Canada
* Phone: 613-941-2102
* Email: drew.johnson@canada.ca

**Request for Proposal:**

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking specialized autopsy services for the Canadian CJD Surveillance System (CJDSS). This system aims to identify and diagnose all suspected cases of Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease (CJD) in Canada, understand their causes, and assess associated risks to public health.

The services required include:

* Conducting cranial autopsies to retrieve brain tissue from patients suspected of having CJD
* Submitting brain tissue for pathological examination

**Description of Required Services:**

* The successful bidder will provide specialized laboratory services to conduct cranial autopsies and submit brain tissue for pathological examination
* The bidder must have experience in conducting post-mortem pathological examinations of the brain
* The bidder must be familiar with the requirements of the Canadian CJD Surveillance System

**Eligible Goods and Services:**

* Medical and Health Studies
* Medical/Dental Laboratory Services
* Medical Advisory Services

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical expertise and qualifications of the bidder
* Capacity to meet the timeline and requirements of the project
* Price

**Commercial Agreement:**

This tender is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.

**How to Respond:**

Bidders must submit their response in accordance with the [Bidder Response Template](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04/91856d86ccd5f67445858db20bf9b4cd/bidder_response_template.pdf) and the [Notice of Proposed Procurement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04
